title: 意大利议员怒发视频反驳中国赠送物资，并批评“中国是地球的毒瘤！”
contents: Maurizio Gasparri is an Italian politician. Gasparri was member of the Italian Social Movement and National Alliance. During the course of his career he has served as Minister of Communications. It was during his time in this role that he pushed for the law known popularly as the "legge Gasparri".
